import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function Preview() { const [dept, setDept] = useState(''); const [sem, setSem] = useState(''); const [sect, setSect] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) // Ensure Axios sends credentials axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; // Clear form fields const handleClear = () => { setDept(''); setSem(''); setSect(''); setDate(''); }; useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/previewapi/preview') .then(response => setUsers(response.data)) // Response renamed for clarity .catch(err => console.error('Error fetching users:', err)); // Changed to console.error for better error logging }, []); // Form submit handler const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default form submission axios.post('http://localhost:3001/preview', { dept, sem, sect, date }) .then(result => { console.log('Form submitted successfully:', result); // Clear form fields after successful submission setDept(''); setSem(''); setSect(''); setDate(''); }) .catch(err => { console.error('Error submitting form:', err); // Changed to console.error for better error logging }); }; return (

Welcome Sagar Raj

Student's Attendance Details

setDate(e.target.value)} required />
Add New
{/* data display section */}
{ users.map(user => { return <> })}
Boys Present Girls Present
Hostel-Boys {user.hBoys} Hostel-Girls {user.hGirls}
Day Scholar-Boys {user.cbBoys} Day Scholar-Girls {user.cbGirls}
Out Bus-Boys {user.obBoys} Out Bus-Girls {user.obGirls}
Total-Boys {user.totBoys} Total-Girls {user.totGirls}
) }
